objectDesc.p: Handwritten letter on St. John Baptist Church printed stationary from Rev. J. W. Drake to Eartha M. M. White on 4/18/1929 regarding; rust damage from paperclips at top and bottom of paper.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

you will see from this, that
I am, on the job. to put Fla.Florida over the
top. I am greatly depending upon
you sisters to help me raise our
quota of fifty thousand quarters
for Florida.

I mailed our letters yesterday
and to-day to every Moderator in
the state.

I am, now writing you sisters
to begin to line up your district
see your pastor, and plan your Meetings.

If any time I can be of any
service to you write or wire me,
as I have planedplanned to visit every association

in the state. I have a few 20Â¢ gleaners
if you can use a few write me.
May I be favored with an
early reply from you.
